channel.title: I HAVE A HUGE ERROR :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:
channel.description:
i have all the lastest java:
j2re1.4.2_12
jdk1.5.0_09
jre1.5.0_06
jre1.5.0_09 and
jrockit-R26.4.0-jre1.5.0_06
i have all those my compiler is set at:
@echo off title moparscape Compiler "C:\program files\java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
when i run compiler i get this error:
error:cannot read: *.java 1 error press any key to continue. . .
i press a key and it closes
[u]PART 2[/u]
in run moparscape.bat i have:
@echo off COLOR 08 title moparscape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause
and when i run it it sais:
same as above and. . .
exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: server
[glow=red,2,300]I NEED HELP!!!![/glow]

make sure you have update 9 and re write it lolz…

item.title: I HAVE A HUGE ERROR :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:
item.dc:creator: @ddsafdas ddsafdas
item.description:
@ddsafdas wrote:

i have all the lastest java:

j2re1.4.2_12

jdk1.5.0_09

jre1.5.0_06

jre1.5.0_09 and

jrockit-R26.4.0-jre1.5.0_06

i have all those my compiler is set at:

@echo off
title moparscape Compiler
“C:\program files\java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

when i run compiler i get this error:

error:cannot read: *.java
1 error
press any key to continue. . .

i press a key and it closes

PART 2

in run moparscape.bat i have:

@echo off
COLOR 08
title moparscape Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

and when i run it it sais:

same as above and. . .

exception in thread “main” java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: server

[glow=red,2,300]I NEED HELP!!![/glow]

Read full topic
